      • removeConsentStatusChangedListener

        public void removeConsentStatusChangedListener(com.philips.platform.pif.chi.datamodel.ConsentDefinition consentDefinition,
                                               ConsentStatusChangedListener consentStatusChangedListener)
        Unregister ConsentDefinition for update changes. Call this has no impact if the ConsentDefinition was not registered.
        Specified by:
        removeConsentStatusChangedListener in interface ConsentManagerInterface
        Parameters:
        consentDefinition - ConsentDefinition for which no further callbacks are required.
        consentStatusChangedListener - ConsentStatusChangedListener to be unregistered.
